description: This Dart source file defines several reusable UI widgets for a Flutter application, including header, section, KPI/stat, and empty state components.

classes.name: OceanHeader
classes.description: A subtle ocean gradient container for page headers, displaying a title, optional subtitle, and optional trailing widget.

classes.name: SectionTitle
classes.description: A section title with a divider underline and optional action widget.

classes.name: StatTile
classes.description: A simple KPI/statistics card displaying an icon, label, value, and background color.

classes.name: EmptyState
classes.description: A widget representing an empty state with icon, title, message, and optional action button.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget, constructing the corresponding UI components.
